item.description: CT REIA Virtual Trade Show: How To Profit from Real Estate in Today's Market with Robert Shemin December 26, 2011 through January 3, 2012. The Free Online Webinar will air from 12:00pm to 1:30pm and 8:00pm to 9:30pm each day. Register Now at http://enjoymywebinar... Robert was so popular at our 8th Annual New England Real Estate Conference and Trade Show, CTREIA has partnered with Robert Shemin to bring this information directly to you. So many people were not able to attend because of the Halloween Blizzard, we recorded this video and are giving YOU the opportunity to learn from the comfort of your own home! On this 90-minute Free Webinar, Robert will be discussing the following topics: * What steps to take to get started NOW and put it all together * How to find great deals in today's market * How to analyze a deal in 17 minuets or less * How to find all the money and funds you need * How to sell properties in a soft market in 10 days or less * How to put it all together and get it all together! * 3 proven strategies that can make you a fortune in today's market * And much more...

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: CT REIA Virtual Trade Show - Profit from Real Estate in Today's Market
